name: stridestyle-backend
description: The project is a Node.js and TypeScript-based solution designed to manage an online marketplace's core functionalities. It uses PostgreSQL for structured data like products and orders and MongoDB for unstructured data like user reviews. Key features include user authentication, role-based access control, inventory management, and order processing. The project integrates various backend concepts, including RESTful APIs, caching, and testing, making it an ideal learning tool for mastering backend development in a real-world scenario.
author: Evidence Adejuwon
